name: Crane! (watch out)
description:
Have you ever wondered what its like being a crane controller?

Well, this wont help, but atleast its a fun game!

You are a crane controller who wants money. Fast. Race your crane as fast as you can to the conveyer belt to grab crates and deposit them in their respective spots! Be sure to watch out for which crate you choose, as you might lose another coming down the line!

Controls: A and D to move your crane around in a circle. W and S to shorten and lengthen your rope respectively. Press Q and E to move your rope holder, extending your reach. Once in range, press down and hold SPACEBAR to grab onto crates.

Hope you enjoy your wild ride at the docks!

Made for Mini Jam 62: Colors.

UPDATE 9/8/2020: Minor Bug Fixes.

Developer: decacentum

Music: Sebastian Whyte
